attributes.action: Overturn the Supreme Court's Judgement supporting High Street Bank's Excessive "Penalty Charges"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would request that the Prime Minister and his Government overturn the Supreme Court's Judgement regarding the lawfulness of Bank Charges.

There are over one million bank charges claims currently stayed.  There is over £2.3 billion pounds of value claimed.

The Prime Minister needs to look into this and fully consider the implications of the Judgement handed down by the House of Lords.

rejection.details: The Courts are independent of Government
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
